text: Not yet, the client is running through removing different cards to see which may be causing the issue. Weird thing is we are on sandbox and both have the same view with the same cards, but it’s just on her end. I’ll share once I have more info.

Hello,

I am using this (<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/ui-components/toggle>) toggle component for a CRM Card . But the toggle can not be switched, no matter what I do. Is this a bug or am I missing something in my code?

The function onChange is called when I click it, however the toggle-switch is not rendered.

These are my options:
`size="md"`
`label="Label"`
`labelDisplay="top"`
`checked={true}`
`textChecked={"yes"}`
`textUnchecked={"no"}`
`readonly={false}`
`onChange={() => toggleFunction()}`
you have to set the value for the toggle, using the `checked` prop

Hey all, I'm taking a look at this today. Would anyone running into this partner-access issue be willing to share the ID for the customer account that they're running into these issues for (feel free to DM me)? I haven't been able to reproduce this on my own, so I want to dig into the scopes that changed for you as a result of this permission change.
Unfortunately, I don't have access to that account anymore :slightly_frowning_face:

No problem! We finally got to the bottom of this. We had code in-app that was checking to verify that a user had super-admin auth in order to connect to the locally running project dev server. A fix for this should be coming soon.
